name: Shrouded Magic
summary: Choose one cantrip from the occult spell list.
description:
Choose one cantrip from the occult spell list. You can cast this cantrip as an occult innate spell at will, heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.Traits

Fetchling: A creature with this trait is a member of the fetchling ancestry. Fetchlings were once human, but generations of life on the Shadow Plane have transformed them.
